level.text: The Mayor may only consider TANF applicants or TANF recipients for consideration for POWER eligibility.

The Mayor may refer a TANF applicant or recipient for consideration of POWER eligibility at any time, including when a TANF applicant or recipient claims a medical incapacity exemption from work activities.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 4-205.19m and § 4-205.72.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 4(h) of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-241
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.
